title: The Flicker-Man's Shadow
description: A 'Flicker-Man'—a survivor who was caught in a warp-rift—has returned. He's leaving shadows that move on their own.

turns.narrative: The Flicker-Man sits in the tavern, his body semi-translucent. Every few seconds, he 'blinks' out of existence and reappears an inch to the left. His shadow, however, remains fixed to the floor, staring up at him.
turns.consequence_a: Success: He tells you he's 'caught between frequencies'. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You notice the shadow is slowly peeling itself off the floor. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The tavern lights begin to flicker in a rhythmic, stuttering pattern.

turns.narrative: With every flicker of light, the shadow grows larger. It's no longer just a silhouette; it's gaining three dimensions, its surface like oily black velvet.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You confuse the entity's growth pattern. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Strike the shadow with a cold-iron blade
turns.consequence_b: Success: The blade passes through, but the shadow recoils as if burned. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Flicker-Man screams as his shadow begins to pull him into the floorboards.

turns.narrative: The floorboards are turning into a liquid, black tarp. The Flicker-Man is chest-deep in the shadow-mire. 'Help me find my anchor!' he cries.
turns.choice_a: Pull him out with a rope of light (Arcana DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You haul him back to the physical plane. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Dive into the shadow-mire to pull him from below (Str DC 15)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You enter the 'Flip-Side' momentarily. (+1 Secret)
turns.convergence: The Flicker-Man is free, but the shadow has now fully detached and is standing behind the bar.

turns.narrative: The Shadow-Man is a perfect, featureless copy of the Flicker-Man. It reaches for a bottle of 'Glint-Wine' and drinks it; the wine simply vanishes into its chest.
turns.consequence_a: Success: It speaks in a voice like a radio between stations. (+5 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You slice through its chest, but it simply reforms. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Flicker-Man reveals that his 'Anchor'—a copper watch—is still in the warp-rift zone.

turns.narrative: You must travel to the 'Jagged-Fissure', a place where physics is a suggestion. The air here tastes like copper and old static.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find the path through the shifting rocks. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You locate the copper watch immediately. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The watch is floating in the center of a miniature vortex of violet lightning.

turns.narrative: The vortex is trying to pull you in. Around the watch, you can see 'After-Images' of the Flicker-Man's life—his wedding, his first house, his death.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You snatch the watch from the center of the storm. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Disrupt the vortex with a force-wave
turns.consequence_b: Success: The storm collapses, and the watch falls. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: You have the Anchor. The air in the fissure suddenly goes quiet, but your skin is tingling.

turns.narrative: The Shadow-Man appears behind you in the fissure. It's much stronger here. It wants the watch to complete its takeover.
turns.choice_a: Offer the watch to the Shadow
turns.consequence_a: Success: The Shadow merges with the watch, becoming a 'Shadow-Sentinel'. (+1 Gear)
turns.choice_b: Smash the watch on the rocks
turns.consequence_b: Success: You destroy the link, weakening the Shadow. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Shadow-Man lunges for you, his hands like knives of solidified darkness.

turns.narrative: The fight is taking place in two dimensions at once. Every strike you land on the Shadow is echoed in your own mind as a bad memory.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You shrug off the psychic feedback. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Unleash a 'Nova-Flash' to end the darkness
turns.consequence_b: Success: The Shadow is disintegrated. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Flicker-Man appears at the edge of the fissure, his body finally solid and steady.

turns.narrative: The Flicker-Man thanks you. He looks older now, his hair turned white by the experience. He gives you his 'Warp-Cap' as a reward.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a headpiece that allows for short-range blinks. (+1 Gear)
turns.choice_b: Decline and buy him a drink at the tavern
turns.consequence_b: Success: You gain a loyal informant in the Fringe. (+5 Reputation)
turns.convergence: The sun begins to set, the shadows returning to their proper, two-dimensional places.

turns.narrative: You sit on the edge of the fissure, watching the violet lightning fade. The world feels a little more solid today.
turns.choice_a: Write a report for the Council
turns.consequence_a: Success: They reward you with gold for the data. (+750 Gold)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You lose the 'Flicker-Tint' from your skin. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Flicker-Man is anchored, and the Shadow-Man is gone. But the Jagged-Fissure remains open, a wound in the world that won't stop bleeding.

risk_matrix.penalty: Flicker-sickness spreads. -5 Health and -2 to all Dexterity checks for a week.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Tavern patrons report stranger flicking in and out
